tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (NP (DT A) (JJ Gentle) (NN answer)) (VP (VBZ turns) (PRT (RB away)) (NP (NN wrath)))) (, ,) (CC but) (S (NP (DT a) (JJ harsh) (NN word)) (VP (VBZ stirs) (PRT (RP up)) (NP (NN anger)))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [turns/VBZ nsubj>[answer/NN det>A/DT amod>Gentle/JJ] compound:prt>away/RB dobj>wrath/NN punct>,/, cc>but/CC conj:but>[stirs/VBZ nsubj>[word/NN det>a/DT amod>harsh/JJ] compound:prt>up/RP dobj>anger/NN] punct>./.]
